```
package main

import "fmt"

type mySlice1 []int
type mySlice2 []int

func main() {
    var s1 mySlice1
    var s2 mySlice2 = s1

    fmt.Println(s1, s2)
} 
```

```
cannot use s1 (type mySlice1) as type mySlice2 in assignment 
```

```
package main

import "fmt"

type mySlice1 []int

func main() {
    var s1 mySlice1
    var s2 []int = s1

    fmt.Println(s1, s2)
} 
```
